camp.title: Puninga Scratch: Ke Raro Rawa
camp.welcome: Nau mai haere mai ki te Puninga Scratch 2017!
camp.welcomeIntro:
Ruku atu tātou ki te moana nui ki te hoahoa i tō ake waihanga. Waihangatia tētahi mea e kitea i raro i te moana - tuturu rānei, pohewa rānei
Mō te puninga i tēnei tau, me ruku tātou ki te moana hohonu i ngā wāhanga e toru.
camp.part1Details: Waihangatia he hinonga hei whakamōhio atu ki a mātou tētahi momo nō roto i te moana. Ka āhei ana koe ki te hanga i te taniwha o raro i te wai, he pātangatanga, he mango e kai ana i ngā taco, te aha atu rānei.
camp.part1Particpate: Ka tū te wāhanga tuatahi o te puninga i te Main Camp Cabin studio. Kei konei e taea te tuku ō koutou pātai, titiro atu ki ngā waihanga o ngā tāngata kē, me te tuku i ngā hinonga kua waihangatia e koe. Haere ki te studio ki te ako anō!
camp.part2Details: Ināianei, kia pāhekoheko tō kaiwhakaari! He pātai rānei tō te kaiwhakaari? Ka ahatia ina pāwhiritia? He aha tōna momo mana? Te aha noa?
camp.part2Particpate: Part 2 of camp will also take place in the Main Camp Cabin studio. Here you can ask questions, view other Scratchers' creations, and submit your own. Go to the studio to learn more!
camp.part3Details: Create a project using your own creation along with other Scratchers’ creations. It could be a game, story, animation, or anything you come up with!
camp.part3Particpate: The Final Projects Camp Cabin studio will hold part 3 of this year's Scratch Camp. Here you can submit your final project, give feedback to others, and celebrate Scratch Camp! Swim on over to the studio when part 3 comes out!
camp.infoCounselors: The Camp Counselors studio offers a variety of examples for your ocean creation. You can also directly communicate with the Counselors there.
camp.infoPart3: Remember, in part 3, you must use some other creations made for this Scratch Camp. Use their part 2 project to learn about the character's personality!
camp.infoTime: Kaua e āwangawanga, ki te kore koe e āhei ana ki te noho mō te katoa o te wā, ka taea hoki te uru ki ngā wāhanga e taea e koe! Kia whakangahau, me te ruku ki raro rā anō!
